column1: Uchi////Uchi is a great restaurant to share small plates with a group of friends and/or family. The menu descriptions may sound outlandish
column2: but the presentation and taste are like none other sushi or sashimi. There are combinations that you would never think to marry unless you have a creative mind like the chefs here at Uchi. My favorite is the Yokai Berry made with Atlantic Salmon and Dinosaur kale
